title: Arabic 6
text: Thy Paradise is My love; thy heavenly home, reunion with Me. Enter therein and tarry not. This is that which hath been destined for thee in Our kingdom above and Our exalted dominion.

prev.title: Arabic 5
prev.text: Love Me, that I may love thee. If thou lovest Me not, My love can in no wise reach thee. Know this, O servant.

next.title: Arabic 7
next.text: If thou lovest Me, turn away from thyself; and if thou seekest My pleasure, regard not thine own; that thou mayest die in Me and I may eternally live in thee.
